Name: Ultragun Dreamland
About the game: Welcome to the Dreamland! UGDL pits you up against at most 16 of your friends (or others) in a hectic Free-for-All FPS arena inspired by popular classic shooters! Equipped with three weapons, the Blaster, Rocket Launcher, and Rail Rifle - shoot your way to collecting the three Ultra Souls within the map. Holding these will increase your health but be warned, others will want to take it from you! Open the way to the Ultragun and sacrifice the three souls to obtain it; use it to permanently eliminate others until you are the last one standing. Other game modes include Team Deathmatch, Domination (fight for the Ultragun), and Capture (collect points by holding the Ultra Souls) Direct Connect Only! Must connect to servers via IP address Ultragun Dreamland is multiplayer only, but you can play solo with Bots To set up a server you'll need some networking know how for port-forwarding and the such
